article_node.title: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Wall Street Futures Slip
article_node.summary: Wall Street futures slipped on renewed tariff uncertainty, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures down. The 10‑year Treasury yield rose to 4.28%, while the 2‑year held steady at 3.64%. Tesla's India launch underperformed with only about 600 orders, and Meta faced scrutiny for creating unconsented celebrity chatbots. Trump is scheduled to speak at 2 pm, adding further policy uncertainty.
